content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (52.0, -82.0) mining coal
  - Currently refueled with coal (2 coal)
  - Currently working but chest is full
- Wooden chest at position (52.5, -80.5) collecting the mined coal
  - Currently contains 27 coal (reduced to 13 coal after extractions)

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at position (3.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (3.0, -73.0) mining iron ore
  - Currently refueled with coal (2 coal)
  - Currently working
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, -71.5) collecting the mined iron ore
  - Currently contains 22 iron ore (increased from 5)
- Transport belt at position (4.5, -71.5) connected to the mining operation

### Iron Smelting Operation at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore (has 17 coal)
  - Currently not working due to lack of ingredients
- Stone furnace at position (3.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore (has 8 coal)
  - Currently not working due to lack of ingredients

### Automated Iron Plate Production at position (20.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (20.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore
  - Currently working with iron ore
- Input section:
  - Wooden chest at position (20.5, -2.5) for storing iron ore (contains iron ore)
  - Burner inserter at position (20.5, -1.5) with pickup position (20.5, -2.5) and drop position (20.5, -0.5) (fueled with 2 coal)
    - Currently working
- Output section:
  - Burner inserter at position (20.5, 1.5) with pickup position (20.5, 0.5) and drop position (20.5, 2.5) (fueled with 2 coal)
  - Wooden chest at position (20.5, 2.5) for collecting iron plates (contains iron plates)

### Automated Copper Plate Production at position (30.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (30.0, 0.0) for smelting copper ore (has coal)
  - Currently working with copper ore
- Input section:
  - Wooden chest at position (30.5, -2.5) for storing copper ore (contains copper ore)
  - Burner inserter at position (30.5, -1.5) with pickup position (30.5, -2.5) and drop position (30.5, -0.5) (fueled with 2 coal)
    - Currently working
- Output section:
  - Burner inserter at position (30.5, 1.5) with pickup position (30.5, 0.5) and drop position (30.5, 2.5) (fueled with 3 coal)
  - Wooden chest at position (30.5, 2.5) for collecting copper plates (contains 11 copper plates)

### Automated Smelting System at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Input section:
  - Wooden chest at position (0.5, 4.5) storing iron ore (empty)
  - Burner inserter at position (0.5, 2.5) with pickup position (0.5, 3.5) and drop position (0.5, 1.5) (fueled with 1 coal)
    - Currently waiting for source items
- Output section:
  - Burner inserter at position (0.5, -1.5) with pickup position (0.5, -2.5) and drop position

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
Consists of the following entities:
- Input
